participant_abstract.sent: Some different and detailed aspects of design where discussed.
Some final decision was made about the shape, color and electronic design details was made.

participant_actions.sent: Making a prototype for the remote control.

participant_decisions.sent: It should have fancy look and feel.

Energy supply: Battery and Solar cell Approximate size: 5x10 Color and shape: like a yellow banana The LCD and extra buttons with less frequent usage are inside the banana, they will appear like peeling a banana Speech recognition system should also be included

participant_problems.sent: Not enough time to think about some issues
